original_tweet_text: @SlyPerformer @BrandonRStreams Search engine optimization. Technically while youtube is a video and streaming platform, it has a search engine to find videos and live streams and creators right? You can optimize being found more, by how you title and describe your video or liveatream.
generated_comment: lol yeah the 'search' part of YouTube is often forgotten. It's why thumbnails and titles are basically tiny billboards for a search result. Kinda wild when you think about it like that.

original_tweet_text: Y'all will agree with me  that HTML is the DNA of every  website without it, your fancy  site wouldn’t exist—no structure, no SEO (Search Engine Optimization), no accessibility. Clean HTML helps search engines rank you higher, making your content discoverable.
generated_comment: Lol yeah, it's wild how many 'SEO strategies' start before checking the literal foundation. Like optimising the paint job on a house with no walls. HTML debt is real.

original_tweet_text: SEO……Search Engine Optimizationの略。日本語では検索エンジン最適化。Google検索などの検索エンジンで上位表示させたり、そこからクリックしてもらうために行う活動全般を指す。
generated_comment: Yeah, this sums it up perfectly. That "活動全般" (all activities) part is the real kicker. Because it's never really "done," just an ongoing battle to make the search engines happy. Fun times.
